description: This file implements encryption functions for the TLS Crypto Provider Object, including handling various symmetric encryption algorithms such as RC4, RC2, DES, 3DES, IDEA, and AES. It provides a central encrypt function that dispatches to specific algorithm implementations, as well as individual functions for each encryption method.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS TlsCpoEncrypt(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ULONG cipher_algorithm,ANSC_CRYPTO_KEY * i_key,ANSC_CRYPTO_IV * i_iv,void * i_data,ULONG i_data_size,void * o_data,PULONG o_data_size)
methods.description: Main dispatch function that performs encryption based on the specified cipher algorithm, calling algorithm-specific functions.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS TlsCpoEncrypt_DES(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_CRYPTO_KEY * i_key,ANSC_CRYPTO_IV * i_iv,void * i_data,ULONG i_data_size,void * o_data,PULONG o_data_size)
methods.description: Performs DES encryption using the underlying crypto object.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS TlsCpoEncrypt_3DES(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_CRYPTO_KEY * i_key,ANSC_CRYPTO_IV * i_iv,void * i_data,ULONG i_data_size,void * o_data,PULONG o_data_size)
methods.description: Performs 3DES encryption using the underlying crypto object.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS TlsCpoEncrypt_IDEA(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_CRYPTO_KEY * i_key,ANSC_CRYPTO_IV * i_iv,void * i_data,ULONG i_data_size,void * o_data,PULONG o_data_size)
methods.description: Performs IDEA encryption using the underlying crypto object.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS TlsCpoEncrypt_RC2(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_CRYPTO_KEY * i_key,ANSC_CRYPTO_IV * i_iv,void * i_data,ULONG i_data_size,void * o_data,PULONG o_data_size)
methods.description: Performs RC2 encryption using the underlying crypto object.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS TlsCpoEncrypt_RC4(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_CRYPTO_KEY * i_key,ANSC_CRYPTO_IV * i_iv,void * i_data,ULONG i_data_size,void * o_data,PULONG o_data_size)
methods.description: Performs RC4 encryption using the underlying crypto object.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS TlsCpoEncrypt_AES(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_CRYPTO_KEY * i_key,ANSC_CRYPTO_IV * i_iv,void * i_data,ULONG i_data_size,void * o_data,PULONG o_data_size)
methods.description: Performs AES encryption using the underlying crypto object.
